# react-pinch-n-zoom

Trackpad based pinch, zoom, and pan support. Ideal for creating interactive visualizations.

## How to use

```typescript
import PinchNZoom from 'react-pinch-n-zoom';

const App = () => {
  return (
    <PinchNZoom
      style={{
        width: '100%',
        height: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
      }}
    >
      <img
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        alt=""
        height="100"
      />
    </PinchNZoom>
  );
};
```
